// src/services/api.js
const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001';export const fetchPosts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/posts"));if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}return await response.json();}catch(error){console.error('Fetch error:',error);throw error;}};
